name: Lightning Bond
description: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on Rehgar.

name: Stable Portal
description: Increases Portal duration by 50%.

name: Bird's Eye View
description: Permanently increase Raven Form's vision range by 25%. Activate to increase this bonus to 200% for 5 seconds.

name: The Master's Touch
description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying. Reward: Permanently increases the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

name: Quickening
description: Reduces Portal cooldown by 50%.

name: Astral Projection
description: Increases Portal cast range by 50%.

name: Winds of Celerity
description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

name: Invisibility
description: Stealth an allied Hero for 20 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

name: Composite Spear
description: Increases the range of Ancient Spear by 30% and increases Fury generated by 20.

name: Aftershock
description: Using Seismic Slam reduces its Fury cost by 50% for 2 seconds.

name: No Escape
description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 25%.

name: Ferocious Healing
description: Consume 20 Fury to heal 10% of Sonya's maximum Health.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

name: Life Funnel
description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35%, tripled versus Heroes.

name: Live by the Sword
description: Increase the duration of Parry by 40%. If at least 4 Hero Basic Attacks are blocked with a single Parry, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

name: Repelling Strike
description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 35% farther.

name: Glyph of Drain Life
description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%.

name: Devour the Frail
description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

name: Arcane Dynamo
description: Using a Basic Ability increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 3% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 15%.

name: Fully Loaded
description: Reduce Minigun's cooldown by 5 seconds.

name: Bulwark
description: Increases the duration of Armor granted by Shadow Charge from 2 seconds to 4 seconds.

name: From the Shadows
description: Increases the cast range of Shadow Charge by 40%.

name: Speed Demon
description: Being Stunned or Rooted increases Diablo's Movement Speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

name: Demonic Strength
description: Once Overpower's stun expires, the target is slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.

name: Soul Feast
description: Black Soulstone increases Diablo's Health Regeneration by 0.4 per second per Soul.

name: Soul Shield
description: Black Soulstone grants Diablo 0.25 Spell Armor per soul, reducing Ability Damage taken by 0.25% per Soul.

name: Fire Devil
description: Fire Stomp increases Diablo's Basic Attack damage by 20% and surrounds Diablo in flames that deal 20 (+4% per level) damage every second. Lasts 6 seconds.

name: Fearful Presence
description: Activate to reduce the damage dealt by nearby enemy Heroes by 30% for 3 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Diablo have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

name: Blossom Swell
description: Increases Noxious Blossom's radius by 20%.

name: Photosynthesis
description: Crippling Spores returns 10 Mana per enemy hit, up to 40 Mana.

name: Cruel Spores
description: When Crippling Spores hits only Minions or Mercenaries, its cooldown is reduced by 80% and 20 Mana is restored.

name: Nimble Wisp
description: Increases Wisp Movement Speed by 100% and vision radius by 50%.

name: Timelost Wisp
description: Wisp costs no Mana and its cooldown recharges 125% faster while no Wisp is active.

name: Skybound Wisp
description: Wisp can see over obstacles and reveals the area for 4 seconds after dying.

name: Dividing Wisp
description: The first time a Wisp is relocated, it leaves a copy of itself in the previous location.

name: Siphoning Toxin
description: As long as Nature's Toxin is active on an enemy, heal 18 (+4% per level) Health a second.

name: Nature's Culling
description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 150% to non-Heroes.

name: Pestering Blossom
description: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 50%.

name: Giant Killer
description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

name: Choking Pollen
description: Increases Noxious Blossom damage by 125% against enemies afflicted with Nature's Toxin.

name: Let Them Wither
description: Increases Crippling Spores' slow to 50% and causes it to no longer decay.

name: Abolish Magic
description: Target an Ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

name: Taste for Blood
description: Quest: Kill enemy Minions and Heroes within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation.  Reward: Enemy Minions that die increase its damage by 2.  Reward: Enemy Heroes that die increase its damage by 10.  Maximum bonus damage of 500.

name: Sieging Wrath
description: Quest: Every time Globe of Annihilation hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 3, up to 90. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the range of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 33% and its damage is increased by an additional 100.

name: Master of Destruction
description: Reduces the Mana cost from 16 to 10 per second. Every 1.5 seconds spent channeling increases the range by 8.5%, to a maximum of 25%.

name: Gluttony
description: All Shall Burn heals Azmodan for 25% of the damage dealt.

name: Army of Hell
description: Increases Demon Warrior's damage by 20% and reduces their Mana cost by 20.

name: Hellish Hirelings
description: The damage bonus from General of Hell is doubled on Mercenaries.

name: Sin's Grasp
description: Activate to curse an enemy Hero, dealing 248 (+4% per level) damage over 8 seconds. Minion kills reduce this cooldown by 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

name: Infernal Globe
description: Globe of Annihilation's cast time is decreased by 40% and its missile speed is increased by 40%.

name: Bound Minion
description: Using General of Hell on a Minion grants them 75 Armor from non-Heroic sources, decreasing the damage they take by 75%, while also  increasing the damage they deal to non-Heroic targets by 100%. Lasts 30 seconds.

name: Gluttonous Ward
description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that restores 3% of Azmodan's maximum Health and Mana every second for 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

name: March of Sin
description: Increases Azmodan's Movement Speed while channeling All Shall Burn to 80% of normal speed.

name: Black Pool
description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

name: Hellforged Armor
description: Demon Warriors deal 10 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every second and are granted 50 Armor against non-Heroic sources, decreasing the damage they take 50%.

name: Hedonism
description: Reduces Globe of Annihilation's Mana cost by 30.

name: Infused Power
description: All Shall Burn's damage growth maximum is increased by 40%.

name: Battleborn
description: If Globe of Annihilation hits an enemy, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the impact point.

name: Demonic Smite
description: Every 7.5 seconds, the Demon Lieutenant will blast a non-Heroic unit dealing 411 (+4% per level) damage.

name: Sin for Sin
description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

name: Perishing Flame
description: When the Grunts die they explode, dealing 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals 100% increased damage to Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters, and Structures.

name: Fifth Circle
description: Black Pool makes Basic Attacks and Abilities slow enemies Attack and Movement Speeds by 40% for 3 seconds.

name: Bolt of the Storm
description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Forced Recruitment
description: Reduces General of Hell's cooldown by 10 seconds and gains an additional charge.

name: Give Me More!
description: Increases Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%.

name: Seasoned Marksman
description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.  Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

name: Scouting Drone
description: Places a Scouting Drone at target location, granting vision and revealing a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.

name: Focused Attack
description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

name: Vigorous Assault
description: Basic Attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt.

name: Confident Aim
description: Lowers the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 4 seconds if it hits an enemy Hero.

name: Relentless Leader
description: Being Stunned or Rooted knocks away nearby enemies. This effect has an 8 second cooldown. Passive: The cooldown of Adrenaline Rush is reduced by 10 seconds.

name: Hamstring Shot
description: Enemies hit by Penetrating Round have a 20% Movement Speed slow for 3 seconds.

name: Revolution Overdrive
description: Gain 10% Movement Speed while affected by Inspire.  Increase this bonus by 5% for each allied Hero nearby when Inspire is cast.

name: Fight or Flight
description: Whenever Adrenaline Rush activates, it gives 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25% for 4 seconds.  Adrenaline Rush can also be manually activated.

name: Puttin' On a Clinic
description: Whenever an enemy Minion Raynor has recently damaged is destroyed, his Ability cooldowns are reduced by 1.5 seconds.

name: Raynor's Raiders
description: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 50 (+4% per level) damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.

name: Giant Killer
description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

name: Double-Barreled
description: Penetrating Round gains a second charge.

name: Steel Resolve
description: Increases Inspire's duration by 50% and causes Adrenaline Rush to also apply Inspire.

name: Executioner
description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

name: Cluster Round
description: Penetrating Round damage is increased by 20% for each additional target hit up to 100%, and the width is increased by 50%.

name: Bullseye
description: The first enemy hit by Penetrating Round is stunned for 1 second.

name: Scorched Earth
description: An additional set of lasers blast the ground 5 times per second, dealing 40 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

name: Dusk Wings
description: Banshees remain Stealthed while attacking and fire 50% more frequently.

name: A Card to Play
description: Whenever an allied or enemy Hero dies, Raynor's Heroic Ability cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

name: Nexus Frenzy
description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

name: Psionic Synergy
description: Increases Blade Dash's cooldown reduction of Shield Overload by hitting Heroes by 2 seconds.

name: Psionic Wound
description: Twin Blades final strike lowers a Hero's Armor by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

name: Within My Reach
description: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 50%.

name: Bronze Talons
description: Increase Chromie's Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of her next Basic Attack by 250%.

name: Glacial Spike
description: Activate to create a spike that detonates after 4 seconds, dealing 60 (+2.5% per level) damage to nearby enemies. The spike can be affected by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.
